title: Super Jami
description: A 100% vegan deli opened Jan 2015. Serves made-in-house vegan food and vegan products in a friendly, open room with wall paintings by the owners, who are also vegan cookbook authors. Offers breakfast, soups, salads, sandwiches, snacks, daily changing main courses with no meat substitutes or convenience products. Has a small retail section selling vegan products like cookies and fair trade coffee, in addition to made-in-house pestos, spreads and sauces.
